channel.title: Interface change
channel.description: I'm not sure if client or server sided but, im trying to change the numbers that I have from red to yellow on the skills tab. :)

item.title: Interface change
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

tank nation:

I’m not sure if client or server sided but, im trying to change the numbers that I have from red to yellow on the skills tab.

It’s both. I guess. Depends how you look at it.

There’s a packet to send the color to the client. However, it may/may not work for you. If it doesn’t, you’d have to use the sendFrame126 (which is a packet to force text).

I don’t have any code for the packet, you’ll have to design it yourself…
(luckily the client sided is done already x3)
https://rswiki.moparisthebest.com/index.php?title=317:Interface_color
Here’s the documentation on the interface color packet.

Read full topic
